projectSubtitle: Wildlife Rescue and Conservation Tracking System
overview: Designed a Wildlife Rescue and Conservation Tracking System that enables communities, organizations, and volunteers to report, rescue, and rehabilitate wildlife...

challenges.title: Multi-Feature Integration
challenges.description: Balancing reporting, rescues, donations, medical records, and volunteer coordination.

challenges.title: Geolocation & Real-Time Alerts
challenges.description: Ensuring precise incident tracking and timely notifications.

decisions.rationale: Structured yet flexible design for future microservices migration.

architecture.narrative: Users report incidents tagged with geolocation and assigned to rescue teams...

implementation: Designed API contracts and NoSQL data models
reflection: Demonstrated mission-driven modular architecture, geolocation workflow design, and security practices.
